channel.title: Nolan Hemmett's GitHub Site
channel.description: Recent content on Nolan Hemmett's GitHub Site

item.title: I Tried To Use Machine Learning To Predict The March Madness Tournament And It Sort Of Failed.
item.description: This is only my second year picking a bracket for the NCAA March Madness Tournament. So, that being said, I don’t know a lot about basketball in general. Especially when it comes to college basketball, I’m practically useless. I like to watch the tournament most years but other than march, basketball isn’t something I will regularly tune into. This year was different. I wanted to put together a model that would help me predict basketball games so I could win some glory for myself when those predictions were correct.

item.title: FC Barcelona Enters a New Era
item.description: As far as crazy seasons go, FC Barcelona in La Liga have had a rollercoaster of a 2021/22 season. It all started with rumors of Lionel Messi being linked with a move to Paris Saint-Germain F.C in France. Messi sprouted in Barcelona’s club academy and has spent his entire career in Barcelona, so no one saw it coming when the rumor was true and just like that the backbone of Barcelona for 21 years was gone.

item.title: S.S Lazio Is One Of The Best Clubs In European Football
item.description: The last time Lazio won the title in Serie A was in 2000. Since then, the club has always been a solid top 10 squad in Italy. Their highest finish since the title win was in 2015, where they finished third on the table. Currently, Lazio is 6th on the table. A win against Sassuolo on April 2nd put them two points behind Roma. The club is looking to push past Roma to get into the Europa League for next year.

item.title: About Nolan Hemmett
item.description: Welcome to my page. This is a really cool sport’s blog.
